title: Demon Classes & Weaknesses
description: Know your enemy - learn about the demons hunters face!

questions.question: What class of demon feeds on human emotions at concerts?
questions.explanation: Emotion Leeches disguise themselves as fans and feed on the intense emotions generated at K-Pop concerts. Hunters use synchronized choreography to disrupt their feeding!

questions.question: Shadow Mimics can perfectly copy an idol's appearance but cannot replicate their singing voice.
questions.explanation: Shadow Mimics can copy physical appearance but the soul's resonance in a person's voice cannot be replicated. This is why vocal tests are used to identify imposters!

questions.question: What is the weakness of a Nightmare Shade?
questions.explanation: Nightmare Shades attack through dreams but are vulnerable to harmonized vocals - this is why hunter units always train in vocal harmony!

questions.question: Which demon type possesses recording equipment to corrupt music?
questions.explanation: Frequency Fiends hide in studio equipment and embed cursed frequencies in recordings. All KPDH releases are cleansed before distribution!

questions.question: Ancient Dokkaebi demons are attracted to hubris and pride.
questions.explanation: Dokkaebi (Korean goblins) specifically target those with excessive pride. Idol hunters must stay humble to avoid attracting them!

questions.question: What do Stage Haunters feed on?
questions.explanation: Stage Haunters grow stronger from performance failures. They sabotage equipment and cause accidents - hunters counter them with flawless preparation!

questions.question: How do you identify a Gumiho (nine-tailed fox demon) in disguise?

options.text: Their reflection shows their true form

questions.explanation: Mirrors and reflective surfaces reveal a Gumiho's true form. This is why practice rooms have mirrors on every wall!

questions.question: Vengeful Spirit demons are created when trainees are unfairly eliminated from survival shows.
questions.explanation: The intense emotions of unfair elimination can birth Vengeful Spirits. The KPDH monitors all survival shows to prevent demon manifestation!
